shortDescription: An issue was discovered in Car Rental Management System 1.0. An unauthenticated user can perform a file inclusion attack against the /index.php file with a partial filename in the "page" parameter, to cause local file inclusion resulting in code execution.
vulnerabilityName: Car Rental Management System index.php Vulnerability
required_action: Apply remediations or mitigations per vendor instructions or discontinue use of the product if remediation or mitigations are unavailable.
